name: Best Kept Secret

config_properties.name: Best Kept Secret
config_properties.description: An indie music festival in Hilvarenbeek, Netherlands, featuring alternative, indie rock, and electronic music.

ai_profile:
**Best Kept Secret 2026: A Diverse Celebration of Sound**

The 2026 edition of Best Kept Secret continues its legacy as a melting pot of eclectic musical genres, bringing together 52 artists from across the globe. With a lineup spanning Electronic, Post-punk, Hip-Hop, Alternative Rock, and Indie Rock as standout genres, the festival boasts a rich variety of sounds. Notable acts include a mix of established names and emerging talents, with a strong focus on blending experimental styles like Afro-psychedelic funk, Minimal Synth, and Dream Pop alongside crowd favorites like Rap, R&B, and Garage Rock.

This year’s lineup highlights impressive geographic diversity, with artists representing 16 countries, including the USA (11 acts), the Netherlands (10 acts), and the UK (6 acts), alongside artists from Ghana, South Africa, Brazil, and Tanzania. This global mix is mirrored by a commitment to inclusivity, with 12 artists identifying as people of color and a gender balance that includes male, female, non-binary, and mixed-gender groups. The festival also features three DJs, adding an electronic pulse to the weekend’s energy.

With an average artist rating of 7.2 and a strong presence of artists rated 7/10 or higher, Best Kept Secret 2026 promises a lineup that is both well-curated and critically acclaimed. The festival’s dedication to showcasing a wide spectrum of talent, from soulful R&B and dynamic Hip-Hop to experimental sounds and indie rock anthems, ensures that there’s something for everyone. As always, Best Kept Secret celebrates not just music but the diversity and creativity of the global music scene.
